vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to cover, cover in, wainscotted, covered with boards or panelling
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to cover in, panel
1a2) covered, panelled (participle)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 遮蓋, 用木板或鑲板遮蓋
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 以木板遮住, 鑲板, 鑲板的房屋
1a2) 保留, 堆積 (申33:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 遮盖, 用木板或镶板遮盖
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 以木板遮住, 镶板, 镶板的房屋
1a2) 保留, 堆积 (申33:21)
